author: hroskes
body:
The time it takes to run the validation itself does not change noticeably. The time it takes to make the plots decreases by a lot (<1 minute per curve, down from >~10 minutes per curve). The plots themselves are identical to before.

Also some cleanup of unused templates in alternateValidationTemplates, without losing any functionality.
title: Backport of #11022: Make surface deformation plots much faster
